Package thirdparty.dlib.optimization

    Description
    AbstractGeometricMedianFunction
    objective function implementations for use with search algorithms using IFunction as input for the geometric-median.

    objective function implementations for use with search algorithms using IFunction as input for the geometric-median.

    LBFGSOptimization.LineSearchFunction
     
    LBFGSSearchStrategy
    adapted from dlib class optimization/optimization_search_strategies.h Limited-memory BFGS is an optimization algorithm in the family of quasi-Newton methods (finds zeroes or local maxima and minima of functions) that approximates the Broyden–Fletcher–Goldfarb–Shanno (BFGS) algorithm using a limited amount of computer memory.
